name: Seagate FireCuda 540 2TB
description: PCIe 5.0 SSD with extreme 10,000MB/s sequential speeds. Built for enthusiasts and professionals who need the fastest storage available.

reviews.review_text: PCIe 5.0 speeds are real. Benchmarks are wild.
Perfect for video scratch disk. Instant scrubbing.
Needs good airflow to maintain speeds.
